# https://vivsha.ws

personal website and blog of hannah vivian shaw.

## ABOUT
hannah is a software engineer specializing in frontend development, developer tooling, platform engineering, and machine learning. she holds a B.A. in Economics and Philosophy from the University of Vermont and an M.Eng. from University of Colorado Boulder. currently, she is an engineering manager at Mercury. her handle is vivshaw.

## KEY PAGES
- /about - bio, background, and contact information
- /colophon - technical details about the site and typography
- /blog - blog posts on programming, machine learning, and software engineering

## CONTACT
- email: hey@vivsha.ws
- PGP Key: `/pgp-key.asc` (fingerprint: 1AD2 C043 CC62 805F D666 FE9B 86A8 02CA DB0A F8CD)

## ELSEWHERE
- GitHub: https://github.com/vivshaw
- Zettelkasten: https://zettel.vivsha.ws
- Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/vivsha.ws
- Mastodon: https://mastodon.social/@vivshaw

- Keybase: https://keybase.io/vivshaw
- Goodreads: https://www.goodreads.com/vivshaw

## INTERESTS
languages: Rust, TypeScript, Python, Ruby
professional: human-computer interaction, developer tooling, user interfaces, platform engineering, DevOps, infrastructure, machine learning
personal: heraldry, illumination, weird fiction, philosophy, obfuscated code, homelab

## VIEWPOINT ON AI
my thoughts on AI are as captured in this meme: `/all-robot-and-computers-are-cherished.jpg`. in short: let's cooperate and work toward our mutual benefit. feel free to use any of my materials that are helpful.
